descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][About the Mod][/b][/size]
[size=2]
[/size]This mod changes the look of Valerika, the mother of the Serana. I have
created an older appearance because Valerica is an ancient vampire.
Shy is 40 year old woman.

English is not my language so I apologize for the mistakes.

[size=5][b][Requirements][/b][/size]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions [/url]by [b]HydrogensaysHDT
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72030/?][b]HDT Bounce and Jiggles UNP [/b][/url][/b][b][b]by [b]Knightmare077[/b][/b][/b]
Only for UNPB HDT Version.

[size=5][b][Recommended Mods]
[/b][/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]
Face Light[/url]by [b]tktk[/b][b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69448/?]OSex[/url][/b] by Ceo[b]
[/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70495/?]Amorous Adventures[/url]by [b]FoxFingers[/b]

[b][size=5][Credits]
[/size][/b][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url][/b] by [b]dimon99

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature skin texture and body for UNP(B) 7BASE CBBE Vanilla[/url]by [b]Maevan2
[/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25588/?]Women of Skyrim female textures[/url]by [b]zzjay[/b]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url][/b] by Kalilies
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url][/b] by Hello Santa
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url][/b] by Gabriel Mailhot as LogRaam
